about_the_game:
Step into the boots of Jack "Reaper" Thompson, a fearless American commando with a penchant for dark humor. This retro-style FPS gets you back to the golden era of 90s shooters, combining Duke's irreverent humor with Wolfenstein's bizarre war aesthetics and intense blitzkrieg-style gameplay.



Embark on a thrilling journey through Nazi-occupied Europe as you take on the role of Reaper, armed with a diverse array of traditional WWII weapons and experimental Wunderwaffe prototypes. From storming U-Boat shipyards to infiltrating Hitler's mansion, explore iconic Nazi locations and uncover their darkest secrets.

Engage in fast-paced firefights against waves of Nazi soldiers, using your wit and tactical prowess to outsmart the enemy. But beware – the Nazis aren't the only threat lurking in the shadows. Encounter terrifying Nazi experiments gone wrong, from undead monstrosities to heavily armored mining robots, as you race against time to stop the Axis forces from building an atomic bomb.

Key features:
  • Experience the nostalgia of 90s-style FPS gameplay with pixel art graphics.
  • Compete in multiplayer mode up to 10 players: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Co-Op, Capture the Flag
  • Dive into intense firefights against Nazi soldiers using a variety of traditional WWII weapons and experimental Wunderwaffe prototypes.
  • Explore iconic Nazi locations and uncover their darkest secrets, from U-Boat shipyards to Hitler's mansion.
  • Engage in fast-paced combat and outsmart the enemy with tactical prowess.
  • Encounter terrifying Nazi experiments gone wrong, from undead monstrosities to heavily armored mining robots.
  • With its blend of humor, intense action, and nostalgic pixel art graphics, American Commando offers a unique gaming experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish.

Grab your weapons, join the fight, and become the hero that history needs in American Commando!



Disclaimer:
American Commando is a humors FPS retro game. In this project players WILL NOT see a realistic violence or drastic WWII scenes like Nazi work camps, executions, experiments on people, or getting advantage of the minorities. We are NOT using swastikas, SS or any of the Nazi propaganda symbols.

Step into the boots of Jack "Reaper" Thompson, a fearless American commando with a penchant for dark humor. This retro-style FPS gets you back to the golden era of 90s shooters, combining Duke's irreverent humor with Wolfenstein's bizarre war aesthetics and intense blitzkrieg-style gameplay.



Embark on a thrilling journey through Nazi-occupied Europe as you take on the role of Reaper, armed with a diverse array of traditional WWII weapons and experimental Wunderwaffe prototypes. From storming U-Boat shipyards to infiltrating Hitler's mansion, explore iconic Nazi locations and uncover their darkest secrets.

Engage in fast-paced firefights against waves of Nazi soldiers, using your wit and tactical prowess to outsmart the enemy. But beware – the Nazis aren't the only threat lurking in the shadows. Encounter terrifying Nazi experiments gone wrong, from undead monstrosities to heavily armored mining robots, as you race against time to stop the Axis forces from building an atomic bomb.

  • Experience the nostalgia of 90s-style FPS gameplay with pixel art graphics.
  • Compete in multiplayer mode up to 10 players: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Co-Op, Capture the Flag
  • Dive into intense firefights against Nazi soldiers using a variety of traditional WWII weapons and experimental Wunderwaffe prototypes.

Grab your weapons, join the fight, and become the hero that history needs in American Commando!

American Commando is a humors FPS retro game. In this project players WILL NOT see a realistic violence or drastic WWII scenes like Nazi work camps, executions, experiments on people, or getting advantage of the minorities. We are NOT using swastikas, SS or any of the Nazi propaganda symbols.

name: American Commando

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 1GB (720p Low), GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB (1080p Low) or AMD equivalents
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB (1080p High), GeForce GTX 1070 8GB (1080p Extreme) or AMD equivalents
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: American Commando is a retro 3D first-person shooter set in an alternative history of the 2nd World War. Kill hordes of Nazis, explore the mysteries of the Wunderwaffe, unveil the sinister truth behind top secret projects and... bring back 1000 Nazi scalps!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Simplified Chinese, German, Italian
*languages with full audio support
